sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Summer is fiercely defensive of Bran, but is arguably the most playful of the five cubs. He is colored silver and smoky grey, with yellow eyes. Bran names him after waking up from his coma and later mentions, ".... he was the smartest of the litter"
